thread.title: BRIEF-Fujian Aonong Biological Technology Group Incorporation unit obtains high-tech enterprise recognition and to enjoy tax preference

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fujian Aonong Biological Technology Group Incorporation unit obtains high-tech enterprise recognition and to enjoy tax preference

organizations.name: fujian aonong biological technology group incorporation ltd

text:
Jan 17(Reuters) - Fujian Aonong Biological Technology Group Incorporation Ltd
* Says coâ€™s Jiangxi-based biological technology unit was recognized as high-tech enterprise, and to enjoy a tax preference of 15 percent for three years from Jan. 1, 2017 to Dec. 31, 2019
